title.bibl: Record Books of Lithuanian Choruses, 1937, in possession of Secretary of Lithuanian Choruses, Chicago, Ill.

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Record Books of Lithuanian Choruses, 1937, in possession of Secretary of Lithuanian Choruses, Chicago, Ill.

body.p: 1. St. Cecilia Choir (Holy Cross Church), V. Daukas leader, 4513 S. Wood St.
2. Providence of God Choir (Providence of God Church), K. Sabonis leader, 1960 Canalport Ave.
3. Our Lady of Vilna Choir (Our Lady of Vilna Church), J. Braijaitis, 2225 S. Irving Ave.
4. St. Gregory Choir, (St. Anthony Church) A. Mondeika leader, 1616 S. 49th St. Cicero, Ill.
5. Immaculate Conception Choir (Immaculate Conception Church), Justin Kuderka leader, 2636 W. 43rd St.
6. St. George Choir (St. George Church), Anthony S. Procius, leader, 3252 S. Halsted St.
7. All Saints Choir (All Saints Church), J. Rakauskas leader, 10850 S. State St.
8. St. Peter & Paul Choir (St. Peter & Paul Church), St. Raila leader 12352 S. Halsted St.
9. St. Joseph Choir (St. Joseph Church) K. Gaukis leader, 7801 S. Morgan St.
10. Immaculate Conception Choir (Immaculate Conception Church), B. Janusauskas, leader, 2259 W. 107th St.
11. Sasmauskas Male Chorus, A. L. Pocius, 3252 S. Halsted St.
12. Pirmyn (Forward) Chorus, K. Steponavicius, 4142 Archer Ave.
13. Naujos Gadynes Chorus (New Era Chorus) G. Steponavicius, 4142 Archer Ave.
14. Birutes Chorus, John M. Byanskas leader, 281 Olmsted Rd.
15. Juvenile Birute, Miss V. Stradomskaite.
16. Aids (Echo) Chorus, Miss Peciukaite.
17. Kanklin Misrus Chorus (Harp Mixed Choir) J. Kenstavicius, leader, 3116 S. Halsted St.
18. Male Chorus, K. Sleponauricius, leader, 4142 Archer Ave.
19. Leitucos Vycius Chicago Askricio Danios Chorus (Lithuanian Knights, Chicago District Dainos Chorus), J. Rakauskas, 10850 S. State St.
20. Chicago Lithuanian Symphony Orchestra, K. Steponavicius, 4142 Archer Ave.
21. St. Michael Choir (St. Michael Church, N. Kulys, leader, 1619 N. Damen Ave.
